newsitem.title: USA: Northwestern Public Service Q4 shr rises.
newsitem.headline: Northwestern Public Service Q4 shr rises.

text.p: (All data above 000s except per share numbers)
Full company name is Northwestern Public Service

NOTE: Fourth-quarter and fiscal 1996 earnings per share included $0.19/shr gain related to proceeds received after forming Cornerstone, a master limited partnership that consolidated Northwestern's propane properties.
